Gulp SVG Sprites (3 icons in <symbol> mode)

Files Generated:

  1. svg/symbols.svg

Usage:

  1. Include the contents of the SVG file just after the opening <body> tag.
  2. Paste one of the snippets anywhere into your website.

  • rank1


    <svg class="icon rank1"><use xlink:href="#rank1"></use></svg>

    <svg class="icon rank2"><use xlink:href="#rank2"></use></svg>
